channel.title: Documentations on Shriveling world
channel.description: Recent content in Documentations on Shriveling world

item.title: documentation
item.description: shriveling the world documentation Globals / “src/bigBoard/bigBoard” / BigBoard Class: BigBoard C’est la classe qui contrôle toute l’application: la liste des cônes, pays et courbes ainsi que la scene THREE.JS + les commandes et le comportement… This class controls all the application: the list of _cones, _countries, curves This is where the THREE.JS scene is defined with commands and behaviors Hierarchy BigBoard Index Constructors constructor Properties _cameraO _cameraP _controls _datasetManager _geometryText _merger _populations _renderer _scene _showCitiesName _sizetext _stats _windowHalfX _windowHalfY ambient coneBoard countryBoard helper light orthographique configuration Accessors getMergerI lookupCones lookupCountries scaleCones scaleCountries showCones showCountries state withLimits Methods _animate _init addCones addCountries cleanAll cleanCones cleanCountries exporterOBJ extrude getConeByMouse getCones getCountries getCountryByMouse highLightCones highLightCountries rescaleText setLimits showCitiesName showConesCriterias showCountriesCriterias toggleShowCity updateCityName Constructors constructor + new BigBoard(): BigBoard

item.title: documentation
item.description: shriveling the world documentation Globals / “src/common/referential” / NEDLocal Class: NEDLocal General model for the orientation of geometric elements As cones are drawn below the earth surface, we chose the North East Down orientation that is the most adapted to our model. North East Down generates ‘navigation’ like orientations for angles on the sphere and on a projected plane Hierarchy NEDLocal Index Constructors constructor Properties _ECEFRef _glslData _matECEF2NED _matNED2ECEF cartoRef Accessors ned2ECEFMatrix Methods NED2Cartographic cartographic2NED direction2Position getClock project Constructors constructor + new NEDLocal(summit?

item.title: documentation
item.description: shriveling the world documentation Globals / “src/definitions/project” / ILookupComplexAlpha Interface: ILookupComplexAlpha It’s a lookup mapping for a given year the slope angle between earth surface and cone slope as cone radius is determined, it’s the key parameter for cone geometries. This slope (alpha) is determined by Hierarchy ILookupComplexAlpha Indexable ▪ [year: string]: IComplexAlphaItem It’s a lookup mapping for a given year the slope angle between earth surface and cone slope as cone radius is determined, it’s the key parameter for cone geometries.
